parameters:
Hey, Aisha-chan, you're keeping everyone waiting, you know? Hurry
up and go.

Ahh...! If I make the delivery, I won't have to work for three
years! The amount is so huge, it made me weak in the knees.

They say we'll polish the ore delivered from Cordain here.
\!We'll also heat it up and cool it down with water...\!I don't
really understand it well.

Can you really make a fortune with something so simple...? How do
they turn Cordain into money, I wonder?

I don't understand the thinking of smart people. I was expecting
to be forced to do some mining somewhere, so this is quite a
surprise.

It's quite generous of them to give you such a lucrative job,
isn't it?

O-Oh, Vita! We won't be able to be together for a while, but once
it's over, I'll take you on a trip or a meal or anything you
want! \!Think about what you want!
スライドスピード = def

When I was born, it was a doll that my father bought. Even though
it got damaged, he repaired it many times... we've always been
together.
